mapper.insert: insert into sportzplatform.team_player (team_refid, participant_refid, played_from, played_to) values (#{teamRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{participantRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playedFrom,jdbcType=DATE}, #{playedTo,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select team_player_id, team_refid, participant_refid, played_from, played_to from sportzplatform.team_player
